entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character, mentioned as writing an essay and having an owl named Hedwig.

entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: Harry's owl, allowed to fly out at night due to the noise she makes when locked in her cage.

entities.name: wendelin the weird
entities.description: A person mentioned in Harry's essay, described as 'the Weird'.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Harry's uncle, who gave in to letting Hedwig fly out at night due to her noise.

entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Harry's enormous cousin, mentioned as snoring loudly in the distance.

relationships.description: Harry owns Hedwig, his owl. This is inferred from Harry being allowed to let her fly out at night.
Uncle Vernon has some level of authority over Harry, as he is the one who gave in to letting Hedwig fly out at night.
Dudley is Harry's cousin, mentioned as snoring loudly in the distance.
